name: @qius/qiusflex
description: QiusFlex - CSS utilities powered by Qius Solutions

scripts.build-lib: sass --update _sass/lib/primeflex.scss:dist/primeflex.css --no-source-map && sass --update _sass/lib/primeflex.scss:dist/primeflex.min.css --no-source-map --style compressed && sass --update _sass/lib/themes:dist/themes && gulp copy-lib

author: Qius Solutions <qius.solutions@gmail.com>
